title: Sketchbook Folio, "Unfinished Sketch of Mountain Range", 1902
provenance: Anna Richards Brewster, Scarsdale, NY, 1905-1952; William T. Brewster,
creditline: Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest
description: light, unfinished sketch of mountains along horizon. Some foreground detail, tiny bit of sky detail, both on left.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sketchbook Folio, "Unfinished Sketch of Mountain Range", 1902.
1902. Graphite on off-white wove paper. Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest. 1953-179-87-41.
